amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 115-363 to clarify the application of 5 USC 552a (The Privacy Act) to the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Collins (GA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
